name: Cat on the Run
description:
The water has been poisoned. Evil robots have seized control of the tribe and slain them. All are dead...except one, who was knocked out in a rockslide caused by the destruction. Determined to stop the evil, the cat set out to defeat the robots and refresh the water once and for all!

Play in 5 levels as you advance from stage to stage, discovering what has happened to the world! Smash robots, leap over rushing water, and more in Cat on the Run!
